OOC: You are right about the first 2 years Transformers molds being 
from Japan, Roborick, but i dont think the Transformers show is 
Japanese(despite the fact it looked anime-ish).







--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> OOC: Ya all are forgetting the best thing about Japan. Not only do 
they
> give us great anime like DBZ and Gundam Wing, but thats where the
> Transformer toys and the original Transformer show is from.
